welcome_message_body: Welcome to Qabr as Sitt, Syria! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Qabr as Sitt has to offer.

restaurants.description: Naranj Restaurant is a middle eastern restaurant located in Al-Qaimarryeh, Old City.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Damascus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Damascus International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.
